ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wasn t planning on the druid casting on me.  I had no shield songs mem d.  Starfire is fire based (like most of the druid spells) - I m guessing it
ygData.messageBody:
> What type of resist does starfire check against? Magic resist
> significantly reduces the damage I take from clerical casters,
> and fire/cold resist does the same against wizard-type
> casters. It's less effective against higher level mobs (wish
> that were true when it's the player casting on a mob)

I wasn't planning on the druid casting on me. I had no shield
songs mem'd. Starfire is fire based (like most of the druid
spells) - I'm guessing it checks fire resist. But the chance
of me resisting a NPC 6 levels higher than me (fully or partially)
would have been really slim. Just a guess. Next time, I'll have
elemental ready.

Harmonic.
